package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "sync"
)

func goRun(round string, wg *sync.WaitGroup)  {
  defer wg.Done()
  loop(round)
}
func loop(round string)  {
	for i := 1; i<=3 ;i++{
		fmt.Printf("Round:%s,\ti:%d\n",round,i)
	}
}

func main()  {
  var wg sync.WaitGroup

  wg.Add(3)
  go goRun("A",&wg)
  go goRun("B",&wg)
  go goRun("C",&wg)

  wg.Wait()
}
